channel.title: Help on npc dialogues on czar [repost]
channel.description:
[code]IF YOU DON'T KNOW DON'T POST[/code]
Well if anyone has noticed on project czar, it has quite a few glitchs and hiyascape is czar based. Whenever I spawn an npc or put it in autospawn.cfg, following delta's "adding npc dialogues", It fishes lob-manta's. Everytime I spawn a new npc it does same thing or nothing at all. I think it is the fishing that is blocking dialogues from working yet I deleted the fishing between case 155. It stopped the fishing when you click an npc but I put dialogues to see if the npc can talk. STILL DOESN'T WORK...Anyone know what to do?

item.title: Help on npc dialogues on czar [repost]
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

[quote=“IP, post:7, topic:187410”]I can help. But again; I use a Dialogue handler. It makes it much easier.

  • Matt.[/quote]

Ok I copied a dialoguehandler CLASS and JAVA file to my folder. Do I need to do anything with my client.java?

Read full topic
item.source: Help on npc dialogues on czar [repost]

item.title: Help on npc dialogues on czar [repost]
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

[quote=“Demi Sphere, post:4, topic:187410”]Going into npchandler.txt, search "moo"

Then paste this under the last bracket.

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOUR TEXT HERE!"; } }[/quote]

…That’s above head, I’m talking about when you talk to an npc

Read full topic
item.source: Help on npc dialogues on czar [repost]

item.title: Help on npc dialogues on czar [repost]
item.dc:creator: @Demi_Sphere Demi Sphere
item.description:
@Demi_Sphere wrote:

Going into npchandler.txt, search "moo"

Then paste this under the last bracket.

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOUR TEXT HERE!"; } }

Read full topic
